cmake


[requires]

xxhash/0.8.2
crc_cpp/1.2.0

glew/2.2.0
shaderc/2021.1
spirv-cross/20210115


[options]
sdl2:iconv=False
glew:shared=True


[imports]
bin, *.dll -> ./bin
lib, *.dll -> ./bin
bin, *.dylib -> ./bin
lib, *.dylib -> ./bin
bin, *.so -> ./bin
lib, *.so -> ./bin
